sentences.en: Article 7 The complainant and respondent shall bear the burden of proof for their own claims.
sentences.cn: 第七条投诉人和被投诉人应当对各自的主张承担举证责任.

sentences.en: Both the complainant and defendant could summon witnesses who were subject to both cross - examination and re - examination.
sentences.cn: 原告方和被告方都可以传讯证人,让其接受交叉询问和反复询问.

sentences.en: Complainant means the party initiating a complaint concerning a domain - name registration.
sentences.cn: 诉讼方是指就域名注册发起诉讼的一方.

sentences.en: Copy of this letter is sent to the Complainant.
sentences.cn: 这个邮件的复印件已经发给了原告.

sentences.en: Damages may be awarded to a complainant on complaint to the county court.
sentences.cn: 如果原告向地方法院提起上诉,就有可能获得损失赔偿费用.

sentences.en: However, in agriculture machinery consumer however complainant is less, ego protects recognizant weakness.
sentences.cn: 然而, 在农机消费者中却投诉者较少, 自我保护意识薄弱.

sentences.en: If the complainant does not agree with the decision , he may ask for reconsideration.
sentences.cn: 控告人如果不服, 可以申请复议.

sentences.en: Provided that notice of any such adjournment shall be given the defendant and to any complainant.
sentences.cn: 但有关该押后研讯的通知书须送予被告人及任何申诉人.

sentences.en: The burden of proof in each case shall be on the complainant.
sentences.cn: 在每种情况下均应由投诉者负责提供证据.

sentences.en: The complainant accused the defendant of cheating him.
The complainant has been exposed to public odium, scandal and contempt.
sentences.cn: 原告遭到了公众的憎恨、非议与蔑视。

sentences.en: The fees for a single - member Panel shall be paid entirely by the Complainant.
sentences.cn: 一人陪审团的费用应该全部由申诉方支付.

sentences.en: The school will keep complainant informed of the status of the complaint investigation.
sentences.cn: 校方将会通知学生投诉事件的状况.

words.tran_cn: 抱怨地；发牢骚地；诉苦地

trans.tran_en: someone who makes a formal complaint in a court of law
